body:
about `name_`: see my reply above
about `unique_name_`: since there's already a function called `uniqueName()` which does something more complicated than `return unique_name_`, I preferred to have a name that implies that something more complicated is going on (because it is).

Happy to change either/both though if you prefer the shorter names.
body_html:
about name_: see my reply above
about unique_name_: since there's already a function called uniqueName() which does something more complicated than return unique_name_, I preferred to have a name that implies that something more complicated is going on (because it is).

Happy to change either/both though if you prefer the shorter names.
